content: single_crochet skip 1 single_crochet shell in next single_crochet skip 1 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 9 shells round 5 slip_stitch to center space of first shell chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space single_crochet in next single_crochet * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in center space of next shell single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 9 shells round 6 slip_stitch to center space of first shell chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 3 4 double_crochet in same space single_crochet in next single_crochet * 4 double_crochet chain 3 4 double_crochet in center space of next shell single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 9 shells 3 round 7 slip_stitch to center space of first shell chain 4 4 treble_crochet chain 3 4 treble_crochet in same space single_crochet in next single_crochet * 4 treble_crochet chain 3 4 treble_crochet in center space of next shell single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 9 shells fasten_off white repeat last 2 rounds until 10 sts remain cut yarn leaving 8 tail to weave through remaining sts pull to gather sts and close opening fasten_off and weave in tail hanger join red to center back at top of stocking cuff attach it securely around the post of a green single_crochet on inside of stocking chain 16 single_crochet around post of green single_crochet next to where red yarn was first attached next round chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet fasten_off and secure yarn tails inside top of cuff cuff trim join red in center space of any shell point on cuff chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in ea treble_crochet and ea single_crochet around end with 2 single_crochet in same space as beginning 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch fasten_off red finishing block stocking by laying it between damp towels stretching cuff points to shape and leave to dry using red thread sew 1 jingle bell to each of the 9 cuff points copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry
